name: Squirrel Legacy II: Children of the Nut
name_original: Squirrel Legacy II: Children of the Nut
description:
Well this is another standard normal RPGmaker game. A fantasy RPG with turn based tactics wedded with nerve wracking dating sim.

Bob is just trying to save the world from the vile Omnicorp with the help of the mysterious Evergreen group. But his childhood friends keep bothering him! It's like they don't understand what is really important in life.​

In a fantastic world populated with exotic fictional races such as the English, Irish, Sheep and Welsh, a new race shall arrive.

Date your choice of bonny lass, cute ewe, dirty hippy or war criminal. Just keep in mind that you are not the only guy trying to hook-up.

This game includes:
- Turn based combat
- Tricky dungeon puzzles
- Terrible, terrible choices
- The inevitable extinction of mankind
